text: wla taqeuduu bikuli tariq ttwedwn alnaas balqtl, 'iin lam yetwkm amwalhm, wtsddun ean sabil allah alqwym min sddaq bih eaza wjl, waeamil salhana, wtbghwn sabil allah 'an takun mewjt, wtmylwnha atbaeana lahwaykm, wtnffirwn alnaas ean atbaeha. wadhkuruu niemat allah taealaa ealaykum 'iidh kan eddkm qalilana fkththarkm, fa'asbahtum 'aqwia' ezyzyn, wanzuruu kayf kan eaqibat almufsidin fi alard, wama hll bihim min alhlak waldmar?
